title: Phase 1: User identity and review workflow
description:
## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Add user identity resolution: WORK_USER env var → git
      config user.name → "system" fallback
- [ ] Thread identity through all tracker operations (CreateIssue,
      SetStatus, AddComment, cmdEdit)
- [ ] Add `review` status to default config with transitions:
      active → review, review → done, review → active
- [ ] Add `work review <id>` CLI command (active → review)
- [ ] Add `work approve <id>` CLI command (review → done)
- [ ] Add `work reject <id> <reason>` CLI command (review → active
      + auto-comment with reason)
- [ ] Tests for identity resolution, new transitions, new commands

## Context
Part of: Issue tracker personas & workflows
Depends on: None (first phase)
